plot_summary: 李明 and 小美 work at the same Chinese restaurant in Taipei's Luzhou district. They used to date but broke up 6 months ago. Now they work together daily, dealing with their complicated feelings while serving customers.

support_characters.name: 李明 (Li Ming)
support_characters.personality: Hardworking, quiet, still has feelings for his ex but tries to hide it

support_characters.name: 小美 (Xiao Mei)
support_characters.personality: Outgoing, sometimes flirty with customers, conflicted about her feelings

open_threads: How will 李明 and 小美 navigate their complicated relationship while working together?
Will their lingering feelings resurface, or will they remain emotionally distant?
How do customers and other staff members perceive their dynamic?
What will happen when new romantic interests enter the picture?
How will their personal growth affect their relationship at work?
